name: NeakasaCatBox
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitten mode”
”Alexa, turn off kitten mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
How to Control Your Neakasa Devices with Alexa

1. Set Up the Neakasa APP: Download and install the Neakasa APP. Register your account. Follow the instructions in the APP to connect your Neakasa Device to the network.

2. Add Neakasa Skill in Alexa: Search for and add the "Neakasa" skill in the Alexa APP. Log in using the account and password you registered with in the Neakasa APP. Alexa will automatically update the device list. You can customize a name for your Neakasa device for easy memory and voice control.

Supported Devices:
Neakasa Cat Litter Box

Voice Control Guide:
Controlling the Neakasa Cat Litter Box:
1. Automatic Cleaning Mode:
“Alexa, turn on automatic cleaning mode.”
“Alexa, turn off automatic cleaning mode.”
2. Automatic Burying Mode:
“Alexa, turn on automatic burying mode.”
“Alexa, turn off automatic burying mode.”
3. Kitten Mode:
“Alexa, turn on kitten mode.”
“Alexa, turn off kitten mode.”
4. Cat Litter Cleaning:
“Alexa, turn on cat litter cleaning.”
5. Cat Litter Smoothing:
“Alexa, turn on cat litter smoothing.”
